TPixelGroups Struct Reference
[Class Pixel groups container.]

A container for TPixelGroup structures. More...

#include <kernel_pixelgroups.h>


Data Fields

unsigned int NumberOfGroups
unsigned int AllocatedGroups
TPixelGroup * pGroups

Detailed Description

A container for TPixelGroup structures.

Keeps track of more than one pixel group. Most images consists of more than one PixelGroup so this structure is indeed useful.

Definition at line 43 of file kernel_pixelgroups.h.

unsigned int TPixelGroups::AllocatedGroups
 

Parameters:
AllocatedGroups  (unsigned int) Internal use. Remembers the maximum allocated TPixelGroup structures available in the pGroups array.
